statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM GenomicSequencingData ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT sample_id, chromosome_number FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE mutation_type = 'Missense';
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 200 ORDER BY chromosome_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT mutation_type FROM GenomicSequencingData;
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT patient_id, mutation_type, gene_name FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT sample_id, chromosome_number, gene_name FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE mutation_type = 'Deletion' AND chromosome_number = 10
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE sample_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY sample_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM GenomicSequencingData WHERE gene_name LIKE '%BRCA%'
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND patient_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_position FROM mutations WHERE mutation_position BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, patient_id FROM mutations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, COUNT(id) AS mutation_count FROM mutations GROUP BY gene_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution';
SELECT mutation_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_name, mutation_type FROM mutations ORDER BY mutation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE patient_id = 54321 AND mutation_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_name FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Deletion' AND patient_id = 67890 ORDER BY mutation_id ASC;
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_name, mutation_type, patient_id FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution'
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY mutation_name DESC
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_name, mutation_type, patient_id FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT DISTINCT mutation_type FROM mutations ORDER BY mutation_type
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mutations
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations ORDER BY mutation_position DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE blood_type='O' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, collection_date FROM samples WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT sequencing_id, sample_id, sequencing_date FROM sequencing_data WHERE sequencing_quality='high';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE mutation_position > 100 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, blood_type FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';

SELECT s.sample_type, sd.sequencing_date, sd.sequencing_quality FROM samples s JOIN sequencing_data sd ON s.sample_id = sd.sample_id WHERE sd.sequencing_quality = 'high' ORDER BY sd.sequencing_date DESC;

SELECT m.gene_name, p.patient_name, s.sample_type, sd.sequencing_date FROM mutations m JOIN samples s ON m.id = s.sample_id JOIN sequencing_data sd ON s.sample_id = sd.sample_id JOIN patients p ON s.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE m.mutation_position < 50 ORDER BY sd.sequencing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_date, quality_score FROM sequencing_results ORDER BY sequencing_date DESC;
SELECT mutation_name, mutation_count FROM mutation_statistics WHERE mutation_count > 100;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area, institution FROM researcher_information;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion' ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female';
SELECT sequencing_date, quality_score FROM sequencing_results WHERE quality_score > 50 ORDER BY sequencing_date ASC;
SELECT mutation_name, mutation_count FROM mutation_statistics WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mutation_count DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area, institution FROM researcher_information WHERE research_area = 'Genetics' OR research_area = 'Bioinformatics';
